pulsesuite.libpulsesuite.strings¶

Author: Rahul R. Sah

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Strings

High-performance string utilities for scientific computing.
class pulsesuite.libpulsesuite.strings.Strings¶

High-performance string utilities for scientific computing.

Provides conversion between numbers and strings, word wrapping, trimming, and case conversion. All methods use camelCase. Context-enabled for future extensibility.

static int2str(i: int, n: int | None = None) → str¶

Convert integer to string, optionally with fixed width.

Parameters:

  • i (int) – Integer to convert.

  • n (int, optional) – Fixed width for output string.

Returns:

String representation of integer.

Return type:

str

static bool2str(x: bool, n: int | None = None) → str¶

Convert boolean to string (‘T’ or ‘F’), optionally with fixed width.

Parameters:

  • x (bool) – Boolean value.

  • n (int, optional) – Fixed width for output string.

Returns:

String representation (‘T’ or ‘F’).

Return type:

str

static dbl2str(x: float, p: int = 5, e: int = 3, frmt: str = 'ES') → str¶

Convert double to string using scientific format.

Parameters:

  • x (float) – Value to convert.

  • p (int) – Precision.

  • e (int) – Exponent length.

  • frmt (str) – Format specifier (‘ES’, ‘EN’, ‘E’, ‘D’).

Returns:

String representation.

Return type:

str

static sgl2str(x: float, p: int = 5, e: int = 3, frmt: str = 'ES') → str¶

Convert single precision float to string using scientific format.

static wordwrap(s: str, n: int = 80) → List[str]¶

Wrap text to lines of maximum length n.

Parameters:

  • s (str) – Input string.

  • n (int) – Maximum line length.

Returns:

List of wrapped lines.

Return type:

List[str]

static trimb(x: str) → str¶

Trim spaces off both ends of a string.

static toupper(s: str) → str¶

Convert string to upper case.

static tolower(s: str) → str¶

Convert string to lower case.

static cmplx2str(z: complex, p: int = 5, e: int = 3) → str¶

Convert complex number to string using dbl2str for real and imaginary parts.
